# Museum-Chatbot
Museum Chatbot ticketing system prototype

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import ChatBot from 'react-simple-chatbot';
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { FaRobot } from 'react-icons/fa';
import { IoClose } from 'react-icons/io5';

const theme = {
  background: '#f5f8fb',
  fontFamily: 'Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif',
  headerBgColor: '#00bfff',
  headerFontColor: '#fff',
  headerFontSize: '20px',
  botBubbleColor: '#00bfff',
  botFontColor: '#fff',
  userBubbleColor: '#fff',
  userFontColor: '#4a4a4a',
};

// Example museum data
const museumsData = {
  Mumbai: [
    {
      name: 'Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya',
      image:"data:image/jpeg;base64,",
      location: 'Mumbai, Maharashtra',
      timings: '10:00 AM - 6:00 PM',
     
    },
    {
      name: 'Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Museum',
      image:"data:image/jpeg;base64,",
      location: 'Mumbai, Maharashtra',
      timings: '10:00 AM - 5:30 PM',
    },
  ],
  Delhi: [
    {
      name: 'National Museum',
      image:"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/India_national_museum_01.jpg/250px-India_national_museum_01.jpg",
      location: 'Delhi',
      timings: '10:00 AM - 5:00 PM',
    },
    {
      name: 'Indian Air Force Museum',
      image:"data:image/jpeg;base64,",
      location: 'Delhi',
      timings: '10:00 AM - 4:00 PM',
    },
  ],
};

// Custom component to display museum details
const MuseumDetails = ({ triggerNextStep, previousStep }) => {
  const { value: city } = previousStep;
  const museums = museumsData[city] || [];

  const handleSelectMuseum = (museumName) => {
    triggerNextStep({ value: museumName });
  };

  return (
    <div style={{ display: 'flex', overflowX: 'scroll' }}>
      {museums.map((museum, index) => (
        <div key={index} style={{ minWidth: '250px', marginRight: '15px', textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <h3>{museum.name}</h3>
          <img
            src={museum.image}
            alt={museum.name}
            style={{ width: '200px', height: '150px', objectFit: 'cover', borderRadius: '5px' }}
          />
          <p>{museum.location}</p>
          <p>{museum.timings}</p>
          <button onClick={() => handleSelectMuseum(museum.name)}>
            {museum.name}
          </button>
        </div>
      ))}
      {!museums.length && <p>No museums found in this city.</p>}
    </div>
  );
};

// Custom component for ticket details
// Custom component for ticket details
const museumDetails = {
  'National Museum': {
    opening: '10:00',
    closing: '17:00',
  },
  // Add more museums as needed
};

function TicketDetails({ steps, triggerNextStep }) {
  const [tickets, setTickets] = useState(1);
  const [date, setDate] = useState('');
  const [time, setTime] = useState('');

  // Get the museum name from the previous step
  const museum = steps && steps['choose-museum'] ? steps['choose-museum'].value : null;
  const museumData = museumDetails[museum] || {};

  // Extract opening and closing times
  const openingTime = museumData.opening || '09:00'; // Default value if not available
  const closingTime = museumData.closing || '18:00';

  // Format time for min and max attributes
  const minTime = openingTime;
  const maxTime = closingTime;

  // Prevent past dates and limit to 3 months in the future
  const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
  const maxDate = new Date();
  maxDate.setMonth(maxDate.getMonth() + 3);
  const maxDateStr = maxDate.toISOString().split('T')[0];

  const handleSubmit = () => {
    if (tickets && date && time) {
      const bookingDetails = {
        tickets,
        date,
        time,
        museum,
      };
      triggerNextStep({ value: bookingDetails });
    } else {
      alert('Please fill in all the fields.');
    }
  };

  return (
    <div style={styles.container}>
      <h3>Enter Ticket Details</h3>
      <label>
        Number of Tickets:
        <input
          type="number"
          value={tickets}
          onChange={(e) => setTickets(e.target.value)}
          min="1"
          style={styles.input}
        />
      </label>
      <label>
        Date:
        <input
          type="date"
          value={date}
          onChange={(e) => setDate(e.target.value)}
          min={today} // Prevent past dates
          max={maxDateStr} // Limit to 3 months in the future
          style={styles.input}
        />
      </label>
      <label>
        Time:
        <input
          type="time"
          value={time}
          onChange={(e) => setTime(e.target.value)}
          min={minTime} // Set minimum time to opening time
          max={maxTime} // Set maximum time to closing time
          style={styles.input}
        />
      </label>
      <button style={styles2.button} onClick={handleSubmit} disabled={!date || !time}>
        Confirm Booking
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}

const styles2 = {
  container: { padding: '20px' },
  input: { display: 'block', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '10px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid #ccc', width: '100%' },
  button: { padding: '10px', backgroundColor: '#007bff', color: '#fff', border: 'none', borderRadius: '5px', cursor: 'pointer' },
};


// Custom component to generate ticket ID and display ticket details
function Confirmation({ steps }) {
  // Retrieve booking details from steps
  const bookingDetails = steps['ticket'] ? steps['ticket'].value : {};

  // Destructure with default values to avoid issues if any value is missing
  const { tickets = 0, date = 'N/A', time = 'N/A', museum = 'N/A' } = bookingDetails;

  // Generate a ticket ID
  const ticketId = `TICKET-${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100000)}`;

  return (
    <div style={styles3.container}>
      <h3>Booking Confirmed!</h3>
      <p>Tickets: {tickets}</p>
      <p>Date: {date}</p>
      <p>Time: {time}</p>
      <p>Ticket ID: {ticketId}</p>
    </div>
  );
}

const styles3 = {
  container: { padding: '20px', textAlign: 'center' },
};

const styles = {
  container: { padding: '20px' },
  input: { display: 'block', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '10px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid #ccc', width: '100%' },
  button: { padding: '10px', backgroundColor: '#007bff', color: '#fff', border: 'none', borderRadius: '5px', cursor: 'pointer' },
};

// Chatbot Component
const TicketBookingChatbot = () => {
  const [showChatbot, setShowChatbot] = useState(false);

  const toggleChatbot = () => {
    setShowChatbot(!showChatbot);
  };

  const steps = [
    {
      id: 'greet',
      message: 'Welcome to the Museum Ticket Booking Chatbot!',
      trigger: 'choose-language',
    },
    {
      id: 'choose-language',
      message: 'Please select your preferred language:',
      trigger: 'language',
    },
    {
      id: 'language',
      options: [
        { value: 'en', label: 'English', trigger: 'choose-city' },
        { value: 'hi', label: 'Hindi', trigger: 'choose-city' },
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 'choose-city',
      message: 'Please select a city:',
      trigger: 'city',
    },
    {
      id: 'city',
      options: [
        { value: 'Mumbai', label: 'Mumbai', trigger: 'show-museums' },
        { value: 'Delhi', label: 'Delhi', trigger: 'show-museums' },
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 'show-museums',
      component: <MuseumDetails />,
      asMessage: true,
      waitAction: true,
      trigger: 'choose-museum',
    },
    {
      id: 'choose-museum',
      user: true,
      trigger: 'ticket',
    },
    {
      id: 'ticket',
      component: <TicketDetails />,
      asMessage: true,
      waitAction: true,
      trigger: 'generate-ticket',
    },
    {
      id: 'generate-ticket',
      component: <Confirmation />,
      asMessage: true,
      end: true,
    },
  ];

  return (
    <div>
      {/* Chatbot Icon */}
      <FaRobot
        style={{
          position: 'fixed',
          bottom: '20px',
          right: '20px',
          fontSize: '40px',
          cursor: 'pointer',
          zIndex: 1000,
        }}
        onClick={toggleChatbot}
      />
      {showChatbot && (
        <div
          style={{
            position: 'fixed',
            bottom: '10px',
            right: '50px',
            zIndex: 999,
            width: '420px',
            height: '600px',
            backgroundColor: 'white',
          }}
        >
          {/* Close Button */}
          <IoClose
            style={{
              position: 'absolute',
              top: '10px',
              right: '10px',
              fontSize: '24px',
              cursor: 'pointer',
              zIndex: 1001,
            }}
            onClick={toggleChatbot}
          />
          <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
            <ChatBot steps={steps} />
          </ThemeProvider>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default TicketBookingChatbot;
